sentences.en: Both were ordered to pay compensation to the bereaved grandmother.
sentences.cn: 两人均被判向死者的祖母赔偿.
他的头发差不多掉净了.

sentences.en: He was bereaved of his wife last year.
His voice was quiet, the voice he used to console the bereaved.
sentences.cn: 他的声音平静, 他用来安慰那被剥夺的声音.

sentences.en: Illness bereaved her of her son.
Mr Dinkins visited the bereaved family to offer comfort.
sentences.cn: 丁金斯先生前往死者家吊唁。

sentences.en: The accident bereaved her of her son.
sentences.cn: 那次事故使她痛失儿子.

sentences.en: The accident bereaved him of his wife and child.
The bereaved do not always need to be taken care of.
sentences.cn: 死者家属并非总是需要照顾.

sentences.en: The bereaved is / are still in mourning.
The bereaved mother was pining away with grief.
sentences.cn: 那位失去孩子的母亲因悲伤而日渐憔悴.

sentences.en: The flags were lowered out of deference to the bereaved family.
sentences.cn: 降旗是出于对死者家属的尊重.

sentences.en: The recent outbreak of hepatitis bereaved the happy family of three members.
sentences.cn: 最近暴发的肝炎使这个幸福的家庭丧失了三条性命.

sentences.en: They were bereaved of their three sons by the war.
sentences.cn: 战争使他们失去了三个儿子.

sentences.en: We did not know how to soothe the bereaved mother.
sentences.cn: 我们不知如何安慰那位丧子的母亲.

words.tran_cn: 丧失的；被剥夺的；失去亲人的

trans.tran_en: having lost a close friend or relative because they have recently died

trans.tran_cn: 使失去（希望、生命等）( bereave的过去式和过去分词)，（尤指死亡）使丧失（亲人、朋友等），使孤寂，<废>抢走（财物）
使丧失（bereave的过去式和过去分词）
